title: 乌克兰军方与俄罗斯军队的苏米（Sumy）地区的苏米（Sumy）地区附近的俄罗斯部队进行了49次战斗，比尔（Bil
content: Ukrainian military had 49 combat engagements with Russian forces near Stara Huta of Sumy region, Terny of Donetsk region, Bilohorivka of Luhansk region, Ivanivske, Klischiyivka, Andriyivka of Donetsk region, Semenivka, Umanske, Pervomayske of Donetsk region, Heorhiyivka, Novomykhaylivka and south to Donetsk地区的Vodyane，Donetsk地区的Staromayorske和Dnipro River东岸的Zaporizhzhia地区的Robotyne-乌克兰武装部队的总参谋
author: Live UA Map
